lines: Welcome to Daitenya, purveyor of the finest silks and garments in Kugane. Our name is taken from Daitenzan, the mightiest peak in Hingashi, and symbolizes our unwavering resolve to achieve the absolute height of elegance and fashion.

Master Keimei recently took over the business from his dear father, and has made it his personal mission to uphold the proud tradition of the Daitenya name, while also introducing worldly fashions befitting our modern age.
MistressMaster Surname. I am pleased to report that Eorzean fashions are beginning to find a receptive audience among the Kugane elite.
At first, I too was skeptical, but there is something about your work─a universal quality that touches one's very soul. I cannot thank you enough for all you have done on our behalf.

Welcome back to Daitenya, MistressMaster Surname! Thanks to you, business is better than ever. These days, Daitenya rises high above all our competitors─just as the great peak from which we take our name.
Speaking personally, I have been pleased to observe that it is not merely the wealthy, but the commonfolk as well have turned an eye to Eorzean fashions.
Still, it would seem the young master has bigger dreams still. I suspect he will be calling on your services again soon.
